description: The Man Surfing, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the  Surfer,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man surfing emoji with medium-light skin tone is depicted riding a cresting wave with impressive balance. The water is rendered with glossy realism and dynamic blue and white gradients, while the surfer's pose suggests motion and exhilaration, all with Apple's characteristic smooth, rounded aesthetic. This emoji on Apple devices perfectly embodies adventure, outdoor activity, and the thrill of the ocean.
